trans-unit.source: Represents a method that will handle drag-and-drop routed events, for example <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.DragEnter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa um método que irá processar eventos encaminhados de arrastar e largar, por exemplo <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.DragEnter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This delegate is used with the following attached events.
trans-unit.target: Este delegado é utilizado com os seguintes eventos anexados.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragOver?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDrop?displayProperty=fullName> This delegate is also used with the following routed events on base elements.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragLeave?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragOver?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDrop?displayProperty=fullName>Este delegado também é utilizado com os seguintes eventos encaminhados em elementos de base.</xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDrop?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragOver?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Estes eventos encaminhados reencaminhar os eventos anexados listados anteriormente para os tornar mais acessível para o modelo de elemento geral [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Drop?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDragOver?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDrop?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.Drop?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDragOver?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDrop?displayProperty=fullName> The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Drop?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDragLeave?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDragOver?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDrop?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.Drop?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDragLeave?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDragOver?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDrop?displayProperty=fullName>Os eventos anexados e os eventos de elemento base encaminhado partilham os seus dados de evento e o bubbling e túnel versões dos eventos encaminhados também partilham dados de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDrop?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDragOver?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.Drop?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDrop?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDragOver?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Drop?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route.
trans-unit.target: Isto pode afetar as características processadas do evento que circula-lo a rota de evento.
Para obter mais informações, consulte [descrição geral de entrada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
